Folin-Ciocalteu method was used to quantify the TPC present in hydroethanolic extract of E. grandiflorum according the procedure described by Jain et al., and gallic acid as standard was used.
16 The contents of total phenolics in plant extract were quantified as milligram (mg) gallic acid equilant (GAE) per milliliter (mL) of plant hydroethanolic extract. While TFC was measured using the method explained by Pranuthi et al.
17 Catechin as standard was used and TFC represented as Âµg CE/g (microgram Catechin per gram) of dried plants material.
